subject: Discrimination
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Homosexuality and Bisexuality
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Mexican fans taunted the opposing goalkeepers in their first two World Cup games with a cheer that ends by shouting a word widely regarded as a derogatory term used against gays.
snippet: Mexican fans taunted the opposing goalkeepers in their first two World Cup games with a cheer that ends by shouting a word widely regarded as a derogatory term used against gays.
